name: @unified-repo-analyzer/backend
description: Backend API server for the Unified Repository Analyzer

scripts.build: rimraf dist && (bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --sourcemap || npm run build:tsc)
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run build --minify || cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:tsc
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun dist/index.js || cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.test: bun test || npm test --silent || echo "No npm tests configured"
scripts.test:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun test --coverage || cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm test --silent
